alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 31 at 11:50AM AKST until February 01 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, Snow with 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM AKST Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday morning through Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
